     <h5>Keeper</h5> Owned and managed by <a class="npc-anchor" id="PLlBRyfn"></a><strong>Jodocus Ostrobert</strong>.  He has thin black hair, sleepy red-looking eyes and a missing tooth (<em>Upset</em>). <small>In the pocket: <strong>a quill</strong>.</small>  <ul>    </ul> <h5>Staff</h5>  <p> <a class="npc-anchor" id="aOIrsnv0"></a> <strong>Arcturius Swanhilde</strong>.     </h4>
  
     <h5>Keeper</h5> Owned and managed by <a class="npc-anchor" id="qyC8RdJi"></a><strong>Lirien of Dorith</strong>.  He has thin black hair, bulging blue eyes and elegant posture (<em>Sickened</em>). <small>In the pocket: <strong>dice</strong>, <strong>2 sp</strong> and <strong>a vial with a dark liquid</strong>.</small>  <ul>    </ul> <h5>Staff</h5>  <p> <a class="npc-anchor" id="c4afh1Zj"></a> <strong>Arngilde of Headsmen</strong>.  She has delicate makeup, bulging red eyes and stained clothes (<em>Sorrowful</em>). <small>In the pocket: <strong>dice</strong>.</small>  <ul>    </ul> </p>  <p> <a class="npc-anchor" id="p4u903VT"></a> <strong>Hedenna Madaltrude</strong>.    <h5> Foreshadowing </h5> <ul>  <li> It is impossible to hear anything inside. </li>   </ul>  <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('R4n6ANRV');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - arched bronze door (<strong>Barricaded</strong>)  </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('F43bGbgv');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - round wooden door (<strong>Half-broken</strong>)  </li>               </ul> <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Countless creepy crawlies all over rush back into the darkness and the hidden alcoves are covered with cracks.  Looking down, you realize you just stepped into a pool of blood.  </blockquote> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('dhD3ShpJ');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a>  <strong>Ga'zuath the Mummy Lord</strong> is inside this area.  It  will attack anyone stepping in.  <p> <strong>Mummy Lord</strong>   <hr/> <div id="block-NglSwF6u" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 15 or 16 in lair (13000 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 17 (natural armor)</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (13d8 + 39)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 20 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>18 <small> +4 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>17 <small> +4 </small> </td> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> <td>18 <small> +4 </small> </td> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-NglSwF6u" id="toggle-NglSwF6u" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-NglSwF6u').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-NglSwF6u" class="statblock-container"> <ul>  <li><strong>Saving Throws: </strong> Con +8, Wis +9, Cha +8, Int +5</li>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> necrotic and poison; bludgeoning, piercing and slashing from nonmagical attacks</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Lawful Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> the languages it knew in life</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Magic Resistance:</strong> The mummy lord has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.</li><li><strong>Rejuvenation:</strong> A destroyed mummy lord gains a new body in 24 hours if its heart is intact, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the mummy lord's heart.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Multiattack:</strong> The mummy can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its rotting fist.</li><li><strong>Rotting Fist:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+9' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+9');"><strong><strong>+9</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Inflicts 14 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6 + 4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6 + 4');"><strong>3d6 + 4</strong></a>) bludgeoning damage plus 21 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='6d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('6d6');"><strong>6d6</strong></a>) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a <strong>DC16</strong> Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the TAG:spell spell or other magic.</li><li><strong>Dreadful Glare:</strong> The mummy lord targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy lord, it must succeed on a <strong>DC16</strong> Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become <strong>frightened</strong> until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also <strong>paralyzed</strong> for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies and mummy lords for the next 24 hours.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div>  <hr/> <ul>  <li><a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('TFJCjpiQ');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a>Monster Hoard: <ul> <li> <strong>36,000 gp</strong> in coins </li> <li><strong>750 gp worth of artifacts (250gp each):</strong> Box of turquoise animal figurines, Bronze crown, Silver necklace with a gemstone pendant</li> <li><strong>Magic Items:</strong> Scroll<sup>8th</sup> of Mind Blank <small>(Wizard)</small></li> </ul> </li>  </ul> </p> </li> <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('AgMOZreh');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> There’s also a ring of fist-sized stones in a large basin and some thick spiderwebs spread all over the place. </li>  <li> Searching will uncover a goat’s skull holding the <strong>key (<span class='alchemy'>&#128863;</span>)</strong> to unlock <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)"> the arched wooden door (to the S) in <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/s1vAD885">area 6</a></span>  </li>       </ul>

   <h5> Foreshadowing </h5> <ul>  <li> It is impossible to hear anything inside. </li>   </ul>  <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('Qdx07Gaw');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - arched iron door (<strong>Half-broken</strong>)  </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('oDCs2hyy');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - arched wooden door (<strong>Locked <span class='alchemy'>&#128863;</span></strong>)   <ul><li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('bkr4sMBS');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">The key is in <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/6Y3Y06Ds"><strong>area 71</strong></a></span> </li> </ul>   </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('07n754B1');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>W</strong> side - odd-shaped wooden door (<strong>Stuck</strong>)  </li>              </ul> <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> A large pentagram was painted here and the corner sides are covered with streaks of mold.    <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('kryh4i7K');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>N</strong> side - rectangular marble door (<strong>Barricaded</strong>)  </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('l3Xg2r8i');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - round wooden door (<strong>Half-broken</strong>)  </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('IFCO1swp');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>W</strong> side - arched bronze door (<strong>Half-broken</strong>)  </li>              </ul> <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Three or four crumbling coffins are scattered here to rot and there are a few claw marks on the ceiling.    <h5> Foreshadowing </h5> <ul>  <li> Traces of something heavy dragged on the ground could be found if examining around the entrances to this area. </li>   </ul>  <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>            <li> <strong>E</strong> side - passage to area 35. </li>      </ul> <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> A sealed wooden sarcophagus is laying here and there are a few tufts of fungus on the corner sides.  There are some very big chests near the far wall.  </blockquote> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('rHvBKJrZ');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> The chests are trapped. There's a small <strong>gas-filled</strong> vial made of an extremely fragile glass hidden under a pulling ring. If undetected using a <strong>DC16</strong> Wisdom (Perception, <small>passive or active</small>) check, it will pop open. Succeed a <strong>DC20</strong> Constitution saving throw or sustain <strong><a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1d6</strong></a></strong> turns of uncontrolled spasms. </li><li>There’s a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>2-in-6</strong></a> chance the chests contain: <ul> <li> <strong>162 gp</strong> in coins </li> <li><strong>150 gp worth of gemstones (50gp each):</strong> <span title="opaque orange to red-brown">Carnelian</span>, <span title="translucent green">Chrysoprase</span>, <span title="transparent pale yellow-brown">Citrine</span></li> <li><strong>Magic Items:</strong> Potion of supreme healing, Scroll<sup>6th</sup> of Circle of Death <small>(Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard)</small></li> </ul> Otherwise, this place was already looted earlier.  </li> <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('wDkiz2w3');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> There’s also a spotted mushroom on an altar and some broken pieces of wood spread all over the place. </li>  <li> Searching will uncover a nook in the wall holding the <strong>key (<span class='alchemy'>&#128834;</span>)</strong> to unlock <span class="spoiler" They  will attack anyone stepping in.  <p> <strong>Will-o'-Wisp</strong>   <hr/> <div id="block-ETX8TR7j" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 2 (450 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 19</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (9d4)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 0 ft. (hover)</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>1 <small> -5 </small> </td> <td>28 <small> +9 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-ETX8TR7j" id="toggle-ETX8TR7j" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-ETX8TR7j').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-ETX8TR7j" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> lightning and poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 120 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> the languages it knew in life</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Consume Life:</strong> As a bonus action, the will-o'-wisp can target one creature it can see within 5 feet of it that has 0 hit points and is still alive. The target must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw against this magic or die. If the target dies, the will-o'-wisp regains 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) hit points.</li><li><strong>Ephemeral:</strong> The will-o'-wisp can't wear or carry anything.</li><li><strong>Incorporeal Movement:</strong> The will-o'-wisp can move through other creatures and objects as if they were TAG:quickref. It takes 5 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d10' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d10');"><strong>1d10</strong></a>) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.</li><li><strong>Variable Illumination:</strong> The will-o'-wisp sheds bright light in a 5 to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of ft. equal to the chosen radius. The will-o'-wisp can alter the radius as a bonus action.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Shock:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 9 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d8' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d8');"><strong>2d8</strong></a>) lightning damage.</li><li><strong>Invisibility:</strong> The will-o'-wisp and its light magically become <strong>invisible</strong> until it attacks or uses its Consume Life, or until its TAG:status ends (as if TAG:status on a spell).</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div>  <hr/> <ul>  <li><a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('pLnElg1X');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a>Monster Hoard: <ul> <li> <strong>200 gp</strong> in coins </li> <li><strong>50 gp worth of gemstones (10gp each):</strong> <span title="opaque mottled deep blue">Azurite</span>, <span title="opaque striated light and dark green">Malachite</span>, 2 &times; <span title="translucent circles of gray, white, brown, blue, or green">Eye agate</span>, <span title="translucent pink or yellow-white with mossy gray or green markings">Moss agate</span></li>  </ul> </li>  </ul> </p> </li> <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('p6m9TEB7');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> There’s also a pile of papers near the wall on the right and some carved figurines spread all over the place. </li>    <li> The words <strong>"Dark Heretic"</strong> in Neutral symbols were written down on a torn piece of parchment. <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">It is the passphrase for the secret door in <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/5dst9Fhz">area 57</a> (to the N)</span>  </li>     </ul>

   <h5> Foreshadowing </h5> <ul>  <li> It is impossible to hear anything inside. </li>   </ul>  <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('mHk1fCJV');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>W</strong> side - round wooden door (<strong>Stuck</strong>)  </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('cgS6qTGX');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>N</strong> side - arched wooden door (<strong>Barricaded</strong>)  </li>      <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('Cn2mCB0a');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - secret door (requiring a <strong>passphrase</strong>)  <ul><li> If detected, a soft whisper will sound the word <strong>"Dreaded"</strong>. <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">The full passphrase is in <strong><a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/bbtki2OZ">area 43</a></strong>. Whisper its words to open.</span>  </li></ul>  </li>       <li> <strong>S</strong> side - passage to area 65. </li>      </ul> <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> This place seems to be an old dungeon cell and the corner sides are scorched with burn marks.  You feel the chill of death curling up your spine.  </blockquote> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('ymEGcGt8');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a>   There are 3 Mummys  inside.   They  will attack anyone stepping in.  <p> <strong>Mummy</strong>   <hr/> <div id="block-7B9QcwiT" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 3 (700 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 11 (natural armor)</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (9d8 + 18)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 20 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>8 <small> -1 </small> </td> <td>15 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>12 <small> +1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-7B9QcwiT" id="toggle-7B9QcwiT" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-7B9QcwiT').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-7B9QcwiT" class="statblock-container"> <ul>  <li><strong>Saving Throws: </strong> Wis +2</li>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> necrotic and poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Lawful Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> the languages it knew in life</li>  </ul>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Multiattack:</strong> The mummy can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its rotting fist.</li><li><strong>Rotting Fist:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+5' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+5');"><strong><strong>+5</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Inflicts 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6 + 3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6 + 3');"><strong>2d6 + 3</strong></a>) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a <strong>DC12</strong> Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the TAG:spell spell or other magic.</li><li><strong>Dreadful Glare:</strong> The mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy, it must succeed on a <strong>DC11</strong> Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become <strong>frightened</strong> until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also <strong>paralyzed</strong> for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24 hours.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div>  <hr/> <ul>  <li><a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('FHApU55S');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a>Monster Hoard: <ul> <li> <strong>218 gp</strong> in coins </li> <li><strong>400 gp worth of gemstones (50gp each):</strong> 2 &times; <span title="opaque bands of black and white, or pure black or white">Onyx</span>, <span title="opaque bands of red and white">Sardonyx</span>, 2 &times; <span title="opaque blue, black, or brown">jasper</span>, <span title="opaque dark gray with red flecks">Bloodstone</span>, <span title="opaque white">Chalcedony</span>, <span title="translucent white with pale blue glow">Moonstone</span></li>  </ul> </li>  </ul> </p> </li> <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('96n4LT8z');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> There are also feathers in a large basin and some ripped pieces of old rope next to it. </li>   <li> There’s a <strong>pressure plate lever</strong> that can open the secret door in <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/tennTPNg">area 10</a> (to the N) </li>      </ul>

It  will attack anyone stepping in.  <p> <strong>Specter</strong>   <hr/> <div id="block-8MnToT2b" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1 (200 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (5d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 0 ft. (hover)</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>1 <small> -5 </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-8MnToT2b" id="toggle-8MnToT2b" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-8MnToT2b').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-8MnToT2b" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> necrotic and poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Incorporeal Movement:</strong> The specter can move through other creatures and objects as if they were TAG:quickref.     <h4 id="title">
    <span id="editable-title" data-attr="Title" data-entity="UC7dcZQX">Shrine</span>

   <h5> Foreshadowing </h5> <ul>  <li> It is impossible to hear anything inside. </li>   </ul>  <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('DTbib9pV');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - round marble door (<strong>Half-broken</strong>)  </li>   <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('X9n47jTS');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>W</strong> side - round iron door (<strong>Locked <span class='alchemy'>&#128869;</span></strong>)   <ul><li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('atBjfqps');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">The key is in <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/xTbh9zFo"><strong>area 21</strong></a></span> </li> </ul>   </li>      <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('QxTWdCyP');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>N</strong> side - secret door (requiring a <strong>passphrase</strong>)  <ul><li> If detected, a sudden scream will say <strong>"Heretic"</strong>. <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">The full passphrase is in <strong><a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/1e4Tq1Be">area 19</a></strong>. Scream the phrase to open.</span>  </li></ul>  </li>       <li> <strong>S</strong> side - passage to area 41. </li>      </ul> <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> A red-painted ceremonial totem stands here and the floor is slick with slime.  Looking down, you realize you just stepped into a pool of blood.  </blockquote> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('OY3j4nv6');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a>  There’s a Specter inside. You spot something quite big lying on the floor.  </blockquote> <ul>  <li> <p>There's a <strong>deadly pit</strong> here, 6' deep, covered only by the darkness. Succeed a <strong>DC20</strong> Dexterity saving throw or fall in.</p> <p> Swarm of Centipedes is  waiting at the bottom. <hr/> <div id="block-jganlcAX" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/2 (100 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12 (natural armor)</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (5d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 20 ft. Its stealth bonus is also improved to +6.</li><li><strong>Sunlight Weakness:</strong> While in sunlight, the shadow has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Strength Drain:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature.    <h5> Foreshadowing </h5> <ul>  <li> Traces of something heavy dragged on the ground could be found if examining around the entrances to this area. </li>   </ul>  <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>            <li> <strong>E</strong> side - passage to area 45. </li>      </ul> <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> The air in this area is dense and misty and there are some cracks on the hidden alcoves.  There is a small crate near the far wall.  </blockquote> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('2FXJLhp1');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> The crate is trapped. There's a <strong>poisoned needle</strong> embedded in one of the wooden planks. If undetected using a <strong>DC17</strong> Wisdom (Perception, <small>passive or active</small>) check, it will prick the greedy victim.    <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('Qdx07Gaw');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>W</strong> side - arched iron door (<strong>Half-broken</strong>)  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Each step here sends countless creepy crawlies back into the dark. </blockquote>  There are stairs here leading in and <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/QEt9gjv0"><strong>out of the dungeon</strong></a>.                                    <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> <p> There's a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1 in 6</strong></a> chance of encountering one of: </p>  <div class='condensed'></div> <table> <tr> <th> <a class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>13 <small> +2 <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> necrotic and poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Amorphous:</strong> The shadow can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.</li><li><strong>Shadow Stealth:</strong> While in dim light or darkness, the shadow can take the Hide action as a bonus action. Its stealth bonus is also improved to +6.</li><li><strong>Sunlight Weakness:</strong> While in sunlight, the shadow has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Strength Drain:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 9 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6 + 2');"><strong>2d6 + 2</strong></a>) necrotic damage, and the target's Strength score is reduced by <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d4');"><strong>1d4</strong></a>. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest., If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a new shadow rises from the corpse <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d4');"><strong>1d4</strong></a> hours later.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 2 </td> <td> Ogre Zombie </td> <td> <div id="block-zBhQ4bVr" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 2 (450 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 8</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (9d10 + 36)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 30 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>19 <small> +5 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>18 <small> +4 </small> </td> <td>3 <small> -4 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>5 <small> -3 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-zBhQ4bVr" id="toggle-zBhQ4bVr" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-zBhQ4bVr').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-zBhQ4bVr" class="statblock-container"> <ul>  <li><strong>Saving Throws: </strong> Wis +0</li>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Neutral Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> understands Common and Giant but can't speak</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Undead Fortitude:</strong> If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. It takes 5 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d10' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d10');"><strong>1d10</strong></a>) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.</li><li><strong>Sunlight Sensitivity:</strong> While in sunlight, the specter has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (<strong>Perception</strong>) checks that rely on sight.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Life Drain:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 6 </td> <td> Swarm of Centipedes </td> <td> <div id="block-jganlcAX" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/2 (100 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12 (natural armor)</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (5d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 20 ft. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Bites:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+3');"><strong><strong>+3</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Inflicts 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='4d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('4d4');"><strong>4d4</strong></a>) piercing damage, or 5 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d4');"><strong>2d4</strong></a>) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer., A creature reduced to 0 hit points by a swarm of centipedes is stable but <strong>poisoned</strong> for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and <strong>paralyzed</strong> while <strong>poisoned</strong> in this way.</li> </ul></div>  </div>     <h4 id="title">
    <span id="editable-title" data-attr="Title">Dungeon Corridor</span>

Inflicts 4 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6 + 1' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6 + 1');"><strong>1d6 + 1</strong></a>) bludgeoning damage.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>       <tr> <td> 5 </td> <td> Ghasts </td> <td> <div id="block-3nSI2NWF" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 2 (450 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 13</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (8d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 30 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>17 <small> +4 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>8 <small> -1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-3nSI2NWF" id="toggle-3nSI2NWF" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-3nSI2NWF').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-3nSI2NWF" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> Common</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Stench:</strong> Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the ghast must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw or be <strong>poisoned</strong> until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the ghast's Stench for 24 hours.</li><li><strong>Turn Defiance:</strong> The ghast and any ghouls within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Bite:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+3');"><strong><strong>+3</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6 + 3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6 + 3');"><strong>2d6 + 3</strong></a>) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a <strong>DC12</strong> Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the TAG:spell spell or other magic.</li><li><strong>Dreadful Glare:</strong> The mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy, it must succeed on a <strong>DC11</strong> Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become <strong>frightened</strong> until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also <strong>paralyzed</strong> for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24 hours.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>    </table>

    </h4>

Inflicts 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6 + 3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6 + 3');"><strong>2d6 + 3</strong></a>) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a <strong>DC12</strong> Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the TAG:spell spell or other magic.</li><li><strong>Dreadful Glare:</strong> The mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy, it must succeed on a <strong>DC11</strong> Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become <strong>frightened</strong> until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also <strong>paralyzed</strong> for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24 hours.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 4 </td> <td> Shadows </td> <td> <div id="block-OSyG9X2v" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/2 (100 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (3d8 + 3)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 40 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>8 <small> -1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-OSyG9X2v" id="toggle-OSyG9X2v" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-OSyG9X2v').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-OSyG9X2v" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> necrotic and poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Amorphous:</strong> The shadow can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.</li><li><strong>Shadow Stealth:</strong> While in dim light or darkness, the shadow can take the Hide action as a bonus action. Its stealth bonus is also improved to +6.</li><li><strong>Sunlight Weakness:</strong> While in sunlight, the shadow has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Strength Drain:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0.     <h4 id="title">

    <div hidden id="doc-title"> Dungeon Corridor in Crypt of the Violent Ogre </div>
    <h4 id="title">
    <span id="editable-title" data-attr="Title">Dungeon Corridor</span>

   <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('6xIfXiqH');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - rectangular wooden door (<strong>Trapped</strong>)  <ul><li> This doorway is magically trapped. When undetected using a <strong>DC18</strong> Wisdom (Perception, <small>passive or active</small>) check, it will trigger when crossing. Succeed a <strong>DC20</strong> Intelligence saving throw or <strong>teleport</strong> to a random area. </li> </ul>  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Droplets of moisture, or so you hope, are dripping down here. </blockquote>

   <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('v8MEnNvL');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - round wooden door (<strong>Half-broken</strong>)  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> The corridor here is damp and slippery from sludge. </blockquote>                                <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> <p> There's a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1 in 6</strong></a> chance of encountering one of: </p>  <div class='condensed'></div> <table> <tr> <th> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1d6</strong></a> </th> <th> Encounter </th> <th> Stats </th> </tr>   <tr> <td> 1 </td> <td> Will-o'-Wisps </td> <td> <div id="block-ETX8TR7j" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 2 (450 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 19</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (9d4)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 0 ft. Fly 50 ft. (hover)</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>1 <small> -5 </small> </td> <td>28 <small> +9 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-ETX8TR7j" id="toggle-ETX8TR7j" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-ETX8TR7j').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-ETX8TR7j" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> lightning and poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 120 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> the languages it knew in life</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Consume Life:</strong> As a bonus action, the will-o'-wisp can target one creature it can see within 5 feet of it that has 0 hit points and is still alive. The target must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw against this magic or die. If the target dies, the will-o'-wisp regains 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) hit points.</li><li><strong>Ephemeral:</strong> The will-o'-wisp can't wear or carry anything.</li><li><strong>Incorporeal Movement:</strong> The will-o'-wisp can move through other creatures and objects as if they were TAG:quickref. It takes 5 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d10' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d10');"><strong>1d10</strong></a>) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.</li><li><strong>Variable Illumination:</strong> The will-o'-wisp sheds bright light in a 5 to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of ft. equal to the chosen radius. The will-o'-wisp can alter the radius as a bonus action.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Shock:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 9 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d8' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d8');"><strong>2d8</strong></a>) lightning damage.</li><li><strong>Invisibility:</strong> The will-o'-wisp and its light magically become <strong>invisible</strong> until it attacks or uses its Consume Life, or until its TAG:status ends (as if TAG:status on a spell).</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 2 </td> <td> Ghouls </td> <td> <div id="block-WXaQ8lUw" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1 (200 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (5d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 30 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>15 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>7 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-WXaQ8lUw" id="toggle-WXaQ8lUw" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-WXaQ8lUw').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-WXaQ8lUw" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> Common</li>  </ul>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Bite:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+2');"><strong><strong>+2</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 7 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d4 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d4 + 2');"><strong>2d4 + 2</strong></a>) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an elf or undead, it must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw or be <strong>paralyzed</strong> for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 3 </td> <td> data-dice='1d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d4');"><strong>1d4</strong></a>) piercing damage.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 4 </td> <td> Mummies </td> <td> <div id="block-7B9QcwiT" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 3 (700 XP)</div> <div><span <li><strong>Saving Throws: </strong> Wis +2</li>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> necrotic and poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Lawful Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> the languages it knew in life</li>  </ul>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Multiattack:</strong> The mummy can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its rotting fist.</li><li><strong>Rotting Fist:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+5' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+5');"><strong><strong>+5</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Inflicts 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6 + 3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6 + 3');"><strong>2d6 + 3</strong></a>) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a <strong>DC12</strong> Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the TAG:spell spell or other magic.</li><li><strong>Dreadful Glare:</strong> The mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy, it must succeed on a <strong>DC11</strong> Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become <strong>frightened</strong> until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also <strong>paralyzed</strong> for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24 hours.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 5 </td> <td> Zombies </td> <td> <div id="block-DwSJ3pzF" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/4 (50 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 8</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (3d8 + 9)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 20 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>3 <small> -4 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>5 <small> -3 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-DwSJ3pzF" id="toggle-DwSJ3pzF" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-DwSJ3pzF').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-DwSJ3pzF" class="statblock-container"> <ul>  <li><strong>Saving Throws: </strong> Wis +0</li>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Neutral Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Undead Fortitude:</strong> If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Slam:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+3');"><strong><strong>+3</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.    <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('y083jSs1');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>N</strong> side - arched wooden door (<strong>Trapped</strong>)  <ul><li> There's a giant blade locked inside a cavity above the door. When undetected using a <strong>DC15</strong> Wisdom (Perception, <small>passive or active</small>) check, it will trigger if stepping through an almost invisible <strong>trip wire</strong>. Succeed a <strong>DC20</strong> Dexterity saving throw or sustain <strong><a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d8' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d8');"><strong>1d8</strong></a> damage</strong>. </li> </ul>  </li>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('rFxYErjF');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - rectangular wooden door (<strong>Barricaded</strong>)  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> The corrider here is dark and damp. </blockquote>                        <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> <p> There's a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1 in 6</strong></a> chance of encountering one of: </p>  <div class='condensed'></div> <table> <tr> <th> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d4');"><strong>1d4</strong></a> </th> <th> Encounter </th> <th> Stats </th> </tr>   <tr> <td> 1 </td> <td> Specters </td> <td> <div id="block-exGCYSCE" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1 (200 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (5d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 0 ft. Fly 50 ft. (hover)</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>1 <small> -5 </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-exGCYSCE" id="toggle-exGCYSCE" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-exGCYSCE').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-exGCYSCE" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> necrotic and poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Incorporeal Movement:</strong> The specter can move through other creatures and objects as if they were TAG:quickref. It takes 5 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d10' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d10');"><strong>1d10</strong></a>) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.</li><li><strong>Sunlight Sensitivity:</strong> While in sunlight, the specter has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (<strong>Perception</strong>) checks that rely on sight.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Life Drain:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 2 </td> <td> Mummies </td> <td> <div id="block-7B9QcwiT" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 3 (700 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 11 (natural armor)</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (9d8 + 18)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 20 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>8 <small> -1 </small> </td> <td>15 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>12 <small> +1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-7B9QcwiT" id="toggle-7B9QcwiT" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-7B9QcwiT').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-7B9QcwiT" class="statblock-container"> <ul>  <li><strong>Saving Throws: </strong> Wis +2</li>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> necrotic and poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Lawful Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> the languages it knew in life</li>  </ul>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Multiattack:</strong> The mummy can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its rotting fist.</li><li><strong>Rotting Fist:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+5' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+5');"><strong><strong>+5</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Inflicts 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6 + 3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6 + 3');"><strong>2d6 + 3</strong></a>) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a <strong>DC12</strong> Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the TAG:spell spell or other magic.</li><li><strong>Dreadful Glare:</strong> The mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy, it must succeed on a <strong>DC11</strong> Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become <strong>frightened</strong> until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also <strong>paralyzed</strong> for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24 hours.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 3 </td> <td> Ghouls </td> <td> <div id="block-bl9Q70D0" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1 (200 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (5d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 30 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>15 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>7 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-bl9Q70D0" id="toggle-bl9Q70D0" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-bl9Q70D0').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-bl9Q70D0" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> Common</li>  </ul>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Bite:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+2');"><strong><strong>+2</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. If the target is a creature other than an elf or undead, it must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw or be <strong>paralyzed</strong> for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 4 </td> <td> Zombies </td> <td> <div id="block-xfQNTQuU" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/4 (50 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 8</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (3d8 + 9)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 20 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>3 <small> -4 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>5 <small> -3 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-xfQNTQuU" id="toggle-xfQNTQuU" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-xfQNTQuU').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-xfQNTQuU" class="statblock-container"> <ul>  <li><strong>Saving Throws: </strong> Wis +0</li>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Neutral Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Undead Fortitude:</strong> If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit.    <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('sC35UhiT');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - arched bronze door (<strong>Trapped</strong>)  <ul><li> There's a giant blade locked inside a cavity above the door. When undetected using a <strong>DC15</strong> Wisdom (Perception, <small>passive or active</small>) check, it will trigger if when crossing, a <strong>pressure plate</strong> is stepped on. Succeed a <strong>DC20</strong> Dexterity saving throw or sustain <strong><a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d8' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d8');"><strong>1d8</strong></a> damage</strong>. </li> </ul>  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> The corridor here is damp and slippery from sludge. </blockquote>                                    <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> <p> There's a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1 in 6</strong></a> chance of encountering one of: </p>  <div class='condensed'></div> <table> <tr> <th> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d7' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d7');"><strong>1d7</strong></a> </th> <th> Encounter </th> <th> Stats </th> </tr>   <tr> <td> 1 </td> <td> Skeletons </td> <td> <div id="block-G8mXzQ7z" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/4 (50 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 13 (armor scraps)</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (2d8 + 4)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 30 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>15 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>8 <small> -1 </small> </td> <td>5 <small> -3 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-G8mXzQ7z" id="toggle-G8mXzQ7z" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-G8mXzQ7z').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-G8mXzQ7z" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Lawful Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak</li>  </ul>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Shortsword:</strong> <a Inflicts 5 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6 + 2');"><strong>1d6 + 2</strong></a>) piercing damage.</li><li><strong>Shortbow:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. The target must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw against this magic or die. If the target dies, the will-o'-wisp regains 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) hit points.</li><li><strong>Ephemeral:</strong> The will-o'-wisp can't wear or carry anything.</li><li><strong>Incorporeal Movement:</strong> The will-o'-wisp can move through other creatures and objects as if they were TAG:quickref. The will-o'-wisp can alter the radius as a bonus action.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Shock:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Its stealth bonus is also improved to +6.</li><li><strong>Sunlight Weakness:</strong> While in sunlight, the shadow has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Strength Drain:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 9 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6 + 2');"><strong>2d6 + 2</strong></a>) necrotic damage, and the target's Strength score is reduced by <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d4');"><strong>1d4</strong></a>. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest., If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a new shadow rises from the corpse <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d4');"><strong>1d4</strong></a> hours later.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 7 </td> <td> Mummies </td> <td> <div id="block-7B9QcwiT" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 3 (700 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 11 (natural armor)</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (9d8 + 18)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 20 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>8 <small> -1 </small> </td> <td>15 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>12 <small> +1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-7B9QcwiT" id="toggle-7B9QcwiT" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-7B9QcwiT').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-7B9QcwiT" class="statblock-container"> <ul>  <li><strong>Saving Throws: </strong> Wis +2</li>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> necrotic and poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Lawful Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> the languages it knew in life</li>  </ul>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Multiattack:</strong> The mummy can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its rotting fist.</li><li><strong>Rotting Fist:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+5' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+5');"><strong><strong>+5</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Inflicts 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6 + 3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6 + 3');"><strong>2d6 + 3</strong></a>) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a <strong>DC12</strong> Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the TAG:spell spell or other magic.</li><li><strong>Dreadful Glare:</strong> The mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy, it must succeed on a <strong>DC11</strong> Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become <strong>frightened</strong> until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also <strong>paralyzed</strong> for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24 hours.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>    </table>

   <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('poJjVlMd');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - arched bronze door (<strong>Stuck</strong>)  </li>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('hKKx6ibM');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>N</strong> side - secret door (<strong>concealed</strong>)  <ul><li> This doorway is concealed as part of a fresco on the wall </li></ul>  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Each step here sends countless creepy crawlies back into the dark. </blockquote>

    <h4 id="title">
    <span id="editable-title" data-attr="Title">Dungeon Corridor</span>

    </h4>

<li><strong>Multiattack:</strong> The mummy can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its rotting fist.</li><li><strong>Rotting Fist:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+5' If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a <strong>DC12</strong> Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the TAG:spell spell or other magic.</li><li><strong>Dreadful Glare:</strong> The mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy, it must succeed on a <strong>DC11</strong> Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become <strong>frightened</strong> until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also <strong>paralyzed</strong> for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24 hours.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 7 </td> <td> Will-o'-Wisps </td> <td> <div id="block-ETX8TR7j" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 2 (450 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 19</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (9d4)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 0 ft. The target must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw against this magic or die. If the target dies, the will-o'-wisp regains 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) hit points.</li><li><strong>Ephemeral:</strong> The will-o'-wisp can't wear or carry anything.</li><li><strong>Incorporeal Movement:</strong> The will-o'-wisp can move through other creatures and objects as if they were TAG:quickref. The will-o'-wisp can alter the radius as a bonus action.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Shock:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature.     </h4>
  
   <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('8sWy9YhV');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>W</strong> side - triangle bronze door (<strong>Stuck</strong>)  </li>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('48aohObE');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - secret door (<strong>concealed</strong>)  <ul><li> This doorway is concealed as part of a fresco on the wall </li></ul>  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> The corridor here is damp and slippery from sludge. </blockquote>                        <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> <p> There's a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1 in 6</strong></a> chance of encountering one of: </p>  <div class='condensed'></div> <table> <tr> <th> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d4');"><strong>1d4</strong></a> </th> <th> Encounter </th> <th> Stats </th> </tr>   <tr> <td> 1 </td> <td> Specter </td> <td> <div id="block-p5glvZjV" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1 (200 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (5d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 0 ft. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the TAG:spell spell or other magic.</li><li><strong>Dreadful Glare:</strong> The mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy, it must succeed on a <strong>DC11</strong> Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become <strong>frightened</strong> until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also <strong>paralyzed</strong> for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24 hours.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>    </table>
