Inflicts 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6 + 3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6 + 3');"><strong>2d6 + 3</strong></a>) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a <strong>DC12</strong> Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the TAG:spell spell or other magic.</li><li><strong>Dreadful Glare:</strong> The mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy, it must succeed on a <strong>DC11</strong> Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become <strong>frightened</strong> until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also <strong>paralyzed</strong> for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24 hours.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 4 </td> <td> Specters </td> <td> <div id="block-exGCYSCE" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1 (200 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (5d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 0 ft. Fly 50 ft. (hover)</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>1 <small> -5 </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-exGCYSCE" id="toggle-exGCYSCE" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-exGCYSCE').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-exGCYSCE" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> necrotic and poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Incorporeal Movement:</strong> The specter can move through other creatures and objects as if they were TAG:quickref. It takes 5 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d10' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d10');"><strong>1d10</strong></a>) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.</li><li><strong>Sunlight Sensitivity:</strong> While in sunlight, the specter has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (<strong>Perception</strong>) checks that rely on sight.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Life Drain:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 5 </td> <td> Swarm of Insects </td> <td> <div id="block-rU67ubAR" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/2 (100 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12 (natural armor)</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (5d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 20 ft. Climb 20 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>3 <small> -4 </small> </td> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>1 <small> -5 </small> </td> <td>7 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>1 <small> -5 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-rU67ubAR" id="toggle-rU67ubAR" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-rU67ubAR').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-rU67ubAR" class="statblock-container"> <ul>    <li><strong>Senses: </strong> blindsight 10 ft.</li>    </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Swarm:</strong> The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Bites:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+3');"><strong><strong>+3</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space.    <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('2d09gaGP');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>N</strong> side - rectangular wooden door (<strong>Barricaded</strong>)  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> The corridor here is damp and slippery from sludge. </blockquote>

    </h4>
  
   <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('gpJoFnHj');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>N</strong> side - odd-shaped wooden door (<strong>Stuck</strong>)  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> The corridor here stinks from excrements. </blockquote>     <h5> Trap! </h5> There's a <strong>crossbow trap</strong> here, hidden inside a </strong>niche in the wall</strong>. When undetected using a <strong>DC15</strong> Wisdom (Perception, <small>passive or active</small>) check, it will trigger if stepping through its <strong>trip wire</strong>. Succeed a <strong>DC20</strong> Dexterity saving throw or sustain <strong><a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d4');"><strong>2d4</strong></a> damage</strong> from the fast and sharp arrow.                                   <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> <p> There's a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1 in 6</strong></a> chance of encountering one of: </p>  <div class='condensed'></div> <table> <tr> <th> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d7' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d7');"><strong>1d7</strong></a> </th> <th> Encounter </th> <th> Stats </th> </tr>   <tr> <td> 1 </td> <td> Shadows </td> <td> <div id="block-OSyG9X2v" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/2 (100 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (3d8 + 3)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 40 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>8 <small> -1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-OSyG9X2v" id="toggle-OSyG9X2v" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-OSyG9X2v').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-OSyG9X2v" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> necrotic and poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Amorphous:</strong> The shadow can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.</li><li><strong>Shadow Stealth:</strong> While in dim light or darkness, the shadow can take the Hide action as a bonus action. Its stealth bonus is also improved to +6.</li><li><strong>Sunlight Weakness:</strong> While in sunlight, the shadow has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Strength Drain:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 9 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6 + 2');"><strong>2d6 + 2</strong></a>) necrotic damage, and the target's Strength score is reduced by <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d4');"><strong>1d4</strong></a>. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest., If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a new shadow rises from the corpse <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d4');"><strong>1d4</strong></a> hours later.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 2 </td> <td> Ghasts </td> <td> <div id="block-3nSI2NWF" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 2 (450 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 13</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (8d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 30 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>17 <small> +4 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>8 <small> -1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-3nSI2NWF" id="toggle-3nSI2NWF" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-3nSI2NWF').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-3nSI2NWF" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> Common</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Stench:</strong> Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the ghast must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw or be <strong>poisoned</strong> until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the ghast's Stench for 24 hours.</li><li><strong>Turn Defiance:</strong> The ghast and any ghouls within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Bite:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+3');"><strong><strong>+3</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 12 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d8 + 3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d8 + 3');"><strong>2d8 + 3</strong></a>) piercing damage.</li><li><strong>Claws:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+5' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+5');"><strong><strong>+5</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Inflicts 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6 + 3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6 + 3');"><strong>2d6 + 3</strong></a>) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw or be <strong>paralyzed</strong> for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 3 </td> <td> Mummies </td> <td> <div id="block-7B9QcwiT" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 3 (700 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 11 (natural armor)</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (9d8 + 18)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 20 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>8 <small> -1 </small> </td> <td>15 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>12 <small> +1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-7B9QcwiT" id="toggle-7B9QcwiT" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-7B9QcwiT').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-7B9QcwiT" class="statblock-container"> <ul>  <li><strong>Saving Throws: </strong> Wis +2</li>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> necrotic and poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Lawful Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> the languages it knew in life</li>  </ul>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Multiattack:</strong> The mummy can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its rotting fist.</li><li><strong>Rotting Fist:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+5' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+5');"><strong><strong>+5</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Inflicts 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6 + 3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6 + 3');"><strong>2d6 + 3</strong></a>) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a <strong>DC12</strong> Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the TAG:spell spell or other magic.</li><li><strong>Dreadful Glare:</strong> The mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy, it must succeed on a <strong>DC11</strong> Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become <strong>frightened</strong> until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also <strong>paralyzed</strong> for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24 hours.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 4 </td> <td> Skeletons </td> <td> <div id="block-G8mXzQ7z" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/4 (50 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 13 (armor scraps)</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (2d8 + 4)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 30 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>15 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>8 <small> -1 </small> </td> <td>5 <small> -3 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-G8mXzQ7z" id="toggle-G8mXzQ7z" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-G8mXzQ7z').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-G8mXzQ7z" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Lawful Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak</li>  </ul>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Shortsword:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Inflicts 5 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6 + 2');"><strong>1d6 + 2</strong></a>) piercing damage.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 5 </td> <td> Zombies </td> <td> <div id="block-xfQNTQuU" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/4 (50 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 8</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (3d8 + 9)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 20 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>3 <small> -4 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>5 <small> -3 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-xfQNTQuU" id="toggle-xfQNTQuU" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-xfQNTQuU').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-xfQNTQuU" class="statblock-container"> <ul>  <li><strong>Saving Throws: </strong> Wis +0</li>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Neutral Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Undead Fortitude:</strong> If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit.     </h4>
  
   <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('Ab7jNJ0M');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>W</strong> side - round iron door (<strong>Half-broken</strong>)  </li>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('RamiYJZA');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - arched bronze door (<strong>Barricaded</strong>)  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Each step here sends countless creepy crawlies back into the dark. </blockquote>                                    <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> <p> There's a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1 in 6</strong></a> chance of encountering one of: </p>  <div class='condensed'></div> <table> <tr> <th> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d7' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d7');"><strong>1d7</strong></a> </th> <th> Encounter </th> <th> Stats </th> </tr>   <tr> <td> 1 </td> <td> Specter </td> <td> <div id="block-p5glvZjV" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1 (200 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (5d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 0 ft. Fly 50 ft. (hover)</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>1 <small> -5 </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-p5glvZjV" id="toggle-p5glvZjV" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-p5glvZjV').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-p5glvZjV" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> necrotic and poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Incorporeal Movement:</strong> The specter can move through other creatures and objects as if they were TAG:quickref. It takes 5 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d10' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d10');"><strong>1d10</strong></a>) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.</li><li><strong>Sunlight Sensitivity:</strong> While in sunlight, the specter has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (<strong>Perception</strong>) checks that rely on sight.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Life Drain:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 2 </td> <td> Ghasts </td> <td> <div id="block-3nSI2NWF" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 2 (450 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 13</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (8d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 30 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>16 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>17 <small> +4 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>11 <small> +1 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>8 <small> -1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-3nSI2NWF" id="toggle-3nSI2NWF" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-3nSI2NWF').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-3nSI2NWF" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> Common</li>  </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Stench:</strong> Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the ghast must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw or be <strong>poisoned</strong> until the start of its next turn. Inflicts 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6 + 3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6 + 3');"><strong>2d6 + 3</strong></a>) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a <strong>DC10</strong> Constitution saving throw or be <strong>paralyzed</strong> for 1 minute.    <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('8YOvvf1H');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>W</strong> side - odd-shaped marble door (<strong>Locked <span class='alchemy'>&#128844;</span></strong>)   <ul><li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('9zjAclaj');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">The key is in <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/gXbUJvUJ"><strong>area 41</strong></a></span> </li> </ul>   </li>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('ySvCIHpG');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - secret door (<strong>concealed</strong>)  <ul><li> This doorway is concealed as part of a fresco on the wall </li></ul>  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> The darkness here is deep and paralyzing. </blockquote>     <h5> Trap! </h5> There's a razor-sharp 4' tall <Strong>swinging blade trap</strong> here, <Strong>hidden</strong> inside a thin long <Strong>wall slit</strong>. When undetected using a <strong>DC15</strong> Wisdom (Perception, <small>passive or active</small>) check, it will trigger if stepping on <strong>pressure plate</strong>. Succeed a <strong>DC20</strong> Dexterity saving throw or sustain <Strong><a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d4');"><strong>2d4</strong></a> damage</strong>.                                 <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> <p> There's a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1 in 6</strong></a> chance of encountering one of: </p>  <div class='condensed'></div> <table> <tr> <th> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d7' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d7');"><strong>1d7</strong></a> </th> <th> Encounter </th> <th> Stats </th> </tr>   <tr> <td> 1 </td> <td> Zombies </td> <td> <div id="block-DwSJ3pzF" The curse lasts until removed by the TAG:spell spell or other magic.</li><li><strong>Dreadful Glare:</strong> The mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy, it must succeed on a <strong>DC11</strong> Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become <strong>frightened</strong> until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also <strong>paralyzed</strong> for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24 hours.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 7 </td> <td> Skeletons </td> <td> <div id="block-G8mXzQ7z" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/4 (50 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 13 (armor scraps)</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (2d8 + 4)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 30 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>15 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>8 <small> -1 </small> </td> <td>5 <small> -3 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-G8mXzQ7z" id="toggle-G8mXzQ7z" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-G8mXzQ7z').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-G8mXzQ7z" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Lawful Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak</li>  </ul>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Shortsword:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.    <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('X9n47jTS');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - round iron door (<strong>Locked <span class='alchemy'>&#128869;</span></strong>)   <ul><li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('atBjfqps');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">The key is in <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/xTbh9zFo"><strong>area 21</strong></a></span> </li> </ul>   </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> This corridor is dark and cold. </blockquote>

    <h4 id="title">
    <span id="editable-title" data-attr="Title">Dungeon Corridor</span>

    </h4>

   <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('kf5NW2cF');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - round wooden door (<strong>Half-broken</strong>)  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> The corridor here stinks from excrements. </blockquote>

    <div hidden id="doc-title"> Dungeon Corridor in Crypt of the Violent Ogre </div>
    <h4 id="title">
    <span id="editable-title" data-attr="Title">Dungeon Corridor</span>

    </h4>
  
   <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('GHeftHa6');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - arched wooden door (<strong>Locked <span class='alchemy'>&#128834;</span></strong>)   <ul><li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('xUhRm4p1');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">The key is in <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/SnwKWAao"><strong>area 13</strong></a></span> </li> </ul>   </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Roaches crawl over the walls and floor of this passage. </blockquote>     <h5> Trap! </h5> <p>There's a <strong>deadly pit</strong> here, 6' deep, covered under <strong>thin wood planks</strong>. If undetected using a <strong>DC15</strong> Wisdom (Perception, <small>passive or active</small>) check, there's a chance of stepping into it. Succeed a <strong>DC20</strong> Dexterity saving throw or fall in.</p> <p> Swarm of Wasps is  waiting at the bottom. <hr/> <div id="block-FIi7UVwO" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/2 (100 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12 (natural armor)</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (5d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 5 ft. Fly 30 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>3 <small> -4 </small> </td> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>1 <small> -5 </small> </td> <td>7 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>1 <small> -5 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-FIi7UVwO" id="toggle-FIi7UVwO" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-FIi7UVwO').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-FIi7UVwO" class="statblock-container"> <ul>    <li><strong>Senses: </strong> blindsight 10 ft.</li>    </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Swarm:</strong> The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Bites:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+3');"><strong><strong>+3</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Inflicts 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='4d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('4d4');"><strong>4d4</strong></a>) piercing damage, or 5 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d4');"><strong>2d4</strong></a>) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> <br/>    <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('ZZvGqSQg');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>W</strong> side - rectangular wooden door (<strong>Locked <span class='alchemy'>&#128797;</span></strong>)   <ul><li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('2r0cIx01');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">The key is in <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/PGTqSyqA"><strong>area 33</strong></a></span> </li> </ul>   </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> An ice-cold breeze can be felt in the passage here. </blockquote>                                          <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> <p> There's a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1 in 6</strong></a> chance of encountering one of: </p>  <div class='condensed'></div> <table> <tr> <th> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d8' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d8');"><strong>1d8</strong></a> </th> <th> Encounter </th> <th> Stats </th> </tr>   <tr> <td> 1 </td> <td> Specter </td> <td> <div id="block-8MnToT2b" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1 (200 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (5d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 0 ft.    <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('sFveIAm8');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>N</strong> side - arched wooden door (<strong>Barricaded</strong>)  </li>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('3N9sqngm');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - secret door (operated by a pressure plate lever)  <ul><li> <ul><li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('D1Xd9KnM');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">The lever is in <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/GnptnnBe"><strong>area 58</strong></a></span> </li> </ul> </li></ul>  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> The air in here is dense and misty. </blockquote>

    </h4>

    </h4>
  
   <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('Q3k2ZBJd');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>W</strong> side - arched bronze door (<strong>Barricaded</strong>)  </li>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('tr3D2mmL');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - secret door (requiring a <strong>passphrase</strong>)  <ul><li> If detected, a sudden scream will say <strong>"Painful"</strong>. <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">The full passphrase is in <strong><a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/r26zYWln">area 51</a></strong>. Scream the phrase to open.</span>  </li></ul>  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Each step here sends countless creepy crawlies back into the dark. </blockquote>

    <div hidden id="doc-title"> Dungeon Corridor in Crypt of the Violent Ogre </div>
    <h4 id="title">
    <span id="editable-title" data-attr="Title">Dungeon Corridor</span>
    <span class="breadcrumbs">  <a class='breadcrumbs-icon' href='/sandbox/nTR8nJOW' title='Fullscreen Hex Map'> <i> <svg fill='currentColor' style='vertical-align:text-top;' width='1.5em'     </h4>
  
   <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('hFn1xN0k');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>S</strong> side - rectangular iron door (<strong>Locked <span class='alchemy'>&#128881;</span></strong>)   <ul><li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('TKoDZayX');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <span class="spoiler" onmouseover="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.add('revealed')},1000)" onmouseout="window.clearTimeout(this.spoilerTimeout);this.spoilerTimeout=window.setTimeout(() => {this.classList.remove('revealed')},1000)">The key is in <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/QGA3L4Zc"><strong>area 47</strong></a></span> </li> </ul>   </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Droplets of moisture, or so you hope, are dripping down here. </blockquote>     <h5> Trap! </h5> There's a <strong>poisonous gas trap</strong> here. When undetected using a <strong>DC17</strong> Wisdom (Perception, <small>passive or active</small>) check, it will trigger if stepping through its <strong>trip wire</strong>, causing the gas to come out of <strong>slits in the wall</strong>. Succeed a <strong>DC15</strong> Constitution saving throw or die in <strong><a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d4');"><strong>3d4</strong></a></strong> turns.                                   <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> <p> There's a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" Inflicts 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6 + 3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6 + 3');"><strong>2d6 + 3</strong></a>) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a <strong>DC12</strong> Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the TAG:spell spell or other magic.</li><li><strong>Dreadful Glare:</strong> The mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy, it must succeed on a <strong>DC11</strong> Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become <strong>frightened</strong> until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also <strong>paralyzed</strong> for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24 hours.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 6 </td> <td> Ghouls </td> <td> <div id="block-IswkgXKc" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1 (200 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (5d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 30 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>15 <small> +3 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>7 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-IswkgXKc" id="toggle-IswkgXKc" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-IswkgXKc').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-IswkgXKc" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   <li><strong>Languages: </strong> Common</li>  </ul>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Bite:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+2');"><strong><strong>+2</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature.    <h5> Doorways </h5> <ul>  <li> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('DxFF1WFB');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> <strong>E</strong> side - round iron door (<strong>Stuck</strong>)  </li>  </ul>  <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Each step here sends countless creepy crawlies back into the dark. </blockquote>                                            <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> <p> There's a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1 in 6</strong></a> chance of encountering one of: </p>  <div class='condensed'></div> <table> <tr> <th> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d9' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d9');"><strong>1d9</strong></a> </th> <th> Encounter </th> <th> Stats </th> </tr>   <tr> <td> 1 </td> <td> Swarm of Wasps </td> <td> <div id="block-FIi7UVwO" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/2 (100 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12 (natural armor)</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (5d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 5 ft. Fly 30 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>3 <small> -4 </small> </td> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>1 <small> -5 </small> </td> <td>7 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>1 <small> -5 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-FIi7UVwO" id="toggle-FIi7UVwO" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-FIi7UVwO').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-FIi7UVwO" class="statblock-container"> <ul>    <li><strong>Senses: </strong> blindsight 10 ft.</li>    </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Swarm:</strong> The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. If the target dies, the will-o'-wisp regains 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) hit points.</li><li><strong>Ephemeral:</strong> The will-o'-wisp can't wear or carry anything.</li><li><strong>Incorporeal Movement:</strong> The will-o'-wisp can move through other creatures and objects as if they were TAG:quickref. The will-o'-wisp can alter the radius as a bonus action.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Shock:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. will-o'-wisp and its light magically become <strong>invisible</strong> until it attacks or uses its Consume Life, or until its TAG:status ends (as if TAG:status on a spell).</li> </ul></div>  </div> <li><strong>Multiattack:</strong> The mummy can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its rotting fist.</li><li><strong>Rotting Fist:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+5' Inflicts 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6 + 3' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6 + 3');"><strong>2d6 + 3</strong></a>) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a <strong>DC12</strong> Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d6');"><strong>3d6</strong></a>) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the TAG:spell spell or other magic.</li><li><strong>Dreadful Glare:</strong> The mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy, it must succeed on a <strong>DC11</strong> Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become <strong>frightened</strong> until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also <strong>paralyzed</strong> for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24 hours.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 5 </td> <td> Shadows </td> <td> <div id="block-OSyG9X2v" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1/2 (100 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (3d8 + 3)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 40 ft.</div> </div> <table class="statblock-table"> <tr><th>STR</th><th>DEX</th><th>CON</th><th>INT</th><th>WIS</th><th>CHA</th></tr> <tr> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>14 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>13 <small> +2 </small> </td> <td>6 <small> -2 </small> </td> <td>10 <small>  </small> </td> <td>8 <small> -1 </small> </td> </tr> </table> <div> <input class="monster-block-toggle" name="toggle-OSyG9X2v" id="toggle-OSyG9X2v" type="checkbox" onclick="javascript:document.getElementById('block-OSyG9X2v').scrollIntoView();"/> <div id="block-toggle-OSyG9X2v" class="statblock-container"> <ul>   <li><strong>Immunities: </strong> necrotic and poison</li>   <li><strong>Senses: </strong> darkvision 60 ft.</li>   <li><strong>Alignment: </strong> Chaotic Evil</li>   </ul>  <hr/> <div><ul> <li><strong>Amorphous:</strong> The shadow can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.</li><li><strong>Shadow Stealth:</strong> While in dim light or darkness, the shadow can take the Hide action as a bonus action. Its stealth bonus is also improved to +6.</li><li><strong>Sunlight Weakness:</strong> While in sunlight, the shadow has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.</li> </ul></div>   <hr/> <h6>Actions</h6> <div><ul> <li><strong>Strength Drain:</strong> <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d20+4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d20+4');"><strong><strong>+4</strong></strong></a> to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 9 (<a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6 + 2' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6 + 2');"><strong>2d6 + 2</strong></a>) necrotic damage, and the target's Strength score is reduced by <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d4');"><strong>1d4</strong></a>. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest., If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a new shadow rises from the corpse <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d4');"><strong>1d4</strong></a> hours later.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 6 </td> <td> Specter </td> <td> <div id="block-p5glvZjV" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1 (200 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (5d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 0 ft.    <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> The corridor here is damp and slippery from sludge. </blockquote>  There are stairs here leading in and <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/QEt9gjv0"><strong>out of the dungeon</strong></a>.                                <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> <p> There's a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' 0-0.136-0.0601-0.136-0.135v-0.656c0-0.0753 0.0606-0.136 0.136-0.136z' style=''/> </g> </svg> </a> > <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/DTuBpg1s">Crypt of the Violent Ogre</a> > Area # 168 </span>
    </h4>
  
   <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Dense spiderwebs drape the passage here. </blockquote>     <h5> Trap! </h5> There's a <strong>poisonous gas trap</strong> here. When undetected using a <strong>DC17</strong> Wisdom (Perception, <small>passive or active</small>) check, it will trigger if stepping through its <strong>trip wire</strong>, causing the gas to come out of <strong>slits in the wall</strong>. Succeed a <strong>DC15</strong> Constitution saving throw or die in <strong><a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='3d4' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('3d4');"><strong>3d4</strong></a></strong> turns.                                   <h5> Wandering Monsters </h5> <p> There's a <a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='1d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('1d6');"><strong>1 in 6</strong></a> chance of encountering one of: </p>  <div class='condensed'></div> <table> <tr> <th> <a    <h5> Description </h5> <blockquote> Oozing spores litter the walls here. </blockquote>

    <h4 id="title">

If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the TAG:spell spell or other magic.</li><li><strong>Dreadful Glare:</strong> The mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy, it must succeed on a <strong>DC11</strong> Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become <strong>frightened</strong> until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also <strong>paralyzed</strong> for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24 hours.</li> </ul></div>  </div> </div> </div> </div> </td> </tr>     <tr> <td> 6 </td> <td> Specter </td> <td> <div id="block-8MnToT2b" class="monster-block"> <div class="statblock"> <div class="statblock-top-row"> <div><span class="section-label">CR:</span> 1 (200 XP)</div> <div><span class="section-label">AC:</span> 12</div> <div><span class="section-label">HP:</span>  (5d8)</div> <div><span class="section-label">Speed:</span> Walk 0 ft.      <p> Vast columns of red stone emerge from the dunes like the fingers of a titanic hand reaching for the sky. </p>   <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll('DTuBpg1s');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> The <strong><a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/DTuBpg1s">Crypt of the Violent Ogre</a></strong> is hidden under the ruins of an ancient temple somewhere beside the ruins of a pyramid. <h5> Entrances </h5>   <p> <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/JljYoV4J"><strong>Stairs leading down into area 14</strong></a> in the dungeon are  deep inside the mouth of a giant stone craved skull, partly buried under a dune.  </p>  <p> <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/SmDDIVFD"><strong>Stairs leading down into area 27</strong></a> in the dungeon are  inside a cave on a formation of rock surrounded by dunes.  </p>  <p> <a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/location/85jGrtqa"><strong>Stairs leading down into area 24</strong></a> in the dungeon are  deep inside the mouth of a giant stone craved skull, partly buried under a dune.  </p>     <p> <h5> <a class="btn-icon" onclick="javascript:window.app.reroll_ex('A32eU0eC','DesertWeather');"><i class="fa fa-dice"></i></a> Regional Weather </h5> <table class='condensed'> <tr> <th><a class="btn-spawn-dice" data-dice='2d6' onclick="javascript:window.app.spawn_dice('2d6');"><strong>2d6</strong></a> </th> <th> Warm Season &dagger;     <h4 id="title"> <span class="breadcrumbs">  <a class='breadcrumbs-icon' href='/sandbox/nTR8nJOW' title='Fullscreen Hex Map'> <i> <svg fill='currentColor' style='vertical-align:text-top;' width='1.5em' height='1.5em' version='1.1' viewBox='0 0 10 10' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'> <g> <path d='m5 0.0863a4.91 4.91 0 0 0-4.91 4.91 4.91 4.91 0 0 0 4.91 4.91 4.91 4.91 0 0 0 4.91-4.91 4.91 4.91 0 0 0-4.91-4.91zm0.187 2.34h1.35l0.678 1.17-0.678 1.17h-1.35l-0.677-1.17 0.677-1.17zm-2.43 1.41h1.36l0.677 1.17-0.677 1.17h-1.36l-0.677-1.17 0.677-1.17zm2.43 1.4h1.35l0.678 1.17-0.678 1.17h-1.35l-0.677-1.17 0.677-1.17z' style=''/> </g> </svg></i> </a> > </span> <br/> Table of Contents </h4>
  
       <div class="toc-section"> <h5><a href="/sandbox/nTR8nJOW/realm/X7li5Fcx">The Lands of Vo'il</a></h5> <p> <blockquote>A charismatic leader has united Vo'il’s disparate thieves’ guilds into one organisation. Bishop Galicius wants this figurehead removed lest they threaten the status quo.</blockquote> </p>  <div class="toc-subsection">  <div class="toc-column"> <h6>Regions</h6> <ul>  <li><a
